arts.ttl: Leverkusen fights past in-form Frankfurt to earn first Bundesliga win
arts.sum: Alejandro Grimaldo scored from two free kicks and Bayer Leverkusen beat in-form Eintracht Frankfurt 3-1 to record its first Bundesliga win and give coach Kasper Hjulmand a winning start to his reign on Friday. Instead, Grimaldo iced the win with another superb free kick in stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Nine-man Leverkusen win first match of season, ending SGE unbeaten record
arts.sum: Bayer 04 Leverkusen pick up their first win in the 2025/26 Bundesliga, defeating Eintracht Frankfurt by three goals to one. B04 were down to nine men after two second yellows in the second half.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Bayer 04 Leverkusen vs. Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Bayer 04 Leverkusen and Eintracht Frankfurt go head-to-head in the third match of their 2025/26 Bundesliga campaigns (Friday, 20:30 CET). Here are the confirmed lineups for both sides.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Hjulmand targeting winning start
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will begin life under Kasper Hjulmand when they welcome Eintracht Frankfurt to the BayArena on Friday.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt’s Jonathan Burkardt deemed fit enough to start against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt head coach Dino Toppmöller remained in an optimistic mood at his Thursday pre-match press conference.

Bayer Leverkusen made the bold decision to sack Erik ten Hag just two games into the Bundesliga season following a 3-3 draw against a 10-man Werder Bremen side in gameweek two. Kasper Hjulmand is the ...

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt welcome Kaua Santos and Burkardt back for Leverkusen clash
arts.sum: Kaua Santos and Jonathan Burkardt will be back in Eintracht Frankfurt's squad for their Friday night game against Bayer Leverkusen.
